headline: Microsoft stake in OpenAI valued at $135B after reaching new deal
summary: Microsoft's (MSFT) stake in OpenAI's non-profit entity (OPAI.PVT) is now valued at $135 billion following the latter's recapitalization. This new agreement also has OpenAI paying for $250 billion in Microsoft Azure services. Morning Brief host Julie Hyman reports more on this breaking news.
